info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 3:28PM CDT until October 04 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL PECOS...SOUTHEASTERN WARD AND CRANE COUNTIES... At 328 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Grandfalls, or 21 miles southeast of Monahans, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Emergency management reported ping pong ball sized hail in Imperial. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Crane, Imperial, Cordona Lake, and Crane County Airport. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
